Reviews.Title: “Genuine Staff”
Reviews.Author: Amandafielding77
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed the staff at this hotel. The Front Desk, concierge and breakfast attendants were all really wonderful. They really understand the tourists needs. We had our DND sign on the door for our stay, however the housekeeping asked us when they saw us how things were and if we needed anything extra. They were suprisingliy very happy to talk with us and our son. The room upon arrival was very clean. You can tell it has been through a remodel and some older items linger, but it is very clean and the staff makes up for it. The pool and game room were a delight.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel in a prime location”
Reviews.Author: Cindy1241
Reviews.Content: Passing through Branson on business we stayed at the Holiday Inn Express Branson. Great location. My counterpart and I had never been to Branson and since we were there for only one evening we did a drive around of the area. Green Mountain Drive is a good location. While there is still alot of tornado damage from Feb in Branson, Green Mountain Drive does not reflect any of this. Very nice hotel in a good area.

Reviews.Title: “Maid service was inadequate”
Reviews.Author: marcy s
Reviews.Content: We had booked two nights and after the first night we chose to cancel the second. The carpet was dirty, dust around the edges, bathroom wood moulding had dirt all around which made us feel that the bathrooms were not cleaned properly.Also spotted blood on sheets. We are AAA members thinking it was a three star but definately not. Did fill out a card about our stay but never heard back.

Reviews.Title: “Good Location near the strip and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Firemandavid
Reviews.Content: Stayed in the Presidential suite (King bedroom with open bathroom, large jacuzzi tub divided from sitting room that contained queen sofabed and kitchen with full sized fridge, dishwasher, glasses, silverware, and plates, large microwave, coffeemaker, and TV's in both rooms.) in August 2012. Room was perfect for our family of five. Great complimentary breakfast, friendly staff, terrific indoor pool, and decent fitness room. We stayed 4 days and while the room was generally clean, the daily housekeeping amounted to bed making and towel exchanges. A couple of prescription drug pills left by a previous guest were found by one of my kids on the floor on two separate days so vacuuming was obviously spotty at best. Space allotted for stand up shower and toilet would be hard for anyone too much over 200lbs. to squeeze into. Other than that the hotel was very good and we would stay there again, especially if visiting Branson just for the amusement parks and shows.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: Jackson1679
Reviews.Content: This is the place my wife and I choose whenever we go to Branson. I love the location. Good breakfast. Friendly people. Clean. It seems to always be very busy. The only negative is the price. I travel a great deal. This hotel is over priced for the Branson market.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible beds”
Reviews.Author: Randy B
Reviews.Content: I'm a platinum member I stay at a lot of HIE. These were the worst beds ever! Everything else was great. As usual the breakfast ladies were so sweet, they really get you off to a great start of the day.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel was a lifesaver! Thank you!”
Reviews.Author: brightestblue
Reviews.Content: After a particularly awful experience at another Branson hotel, the HIE was a breath of freash air. I wish I could remember the name of the person I spoke with on the phone because she was wonderful. She listened sympathetically to our issue, found us a great quiet room, and was even able to get a great rate. When I asked for a rollaway, she said "They are in short supply, but we will do whatever we have to in order to get one for you.". We had it delivered to our room within 5 min. of our arrival. My kids loved the pool- it was clean and well-maintained. Breakfast was great, though the breakfast area was crowded. I am very pleased with our stay! We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Losing ground”
Reviews.Author: Bonnie M
Reviews.Content: We have stayed in the motel three different times now and it is losing ground on cleanliness. The people are still very nice and the breakfast is very good, but the carpet in our room was pretty dirty. We wore white socks in our room and they weren't white after the first evening. The air conditioning vents were moldy. I told the assistant general manager, DeeDee Swanson, about the moldy vents last visit and let them know I would hold off on a review to give them a chance to clean and take care of that issue. They did not fix it. That being said, the rest of the room was clean and satisfactory.

Reviews.Title: “We enjoyed this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ricky S
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this Hotel on July 16, 17, 18. We were treated well by the staff. The room was clean. House keeping kindly went the extra mile to make our stay special. The Breakfast lady is a real delight, and the food was great. The breakfast room gets really busy at 8:30 am, so it is better to eat a little earlier. Good food is very popular.

Reviews.Title: “Good choice in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Brad B
Reviews.Content: Our Family of 4 stayed here June 18 and 19th, 2012. Its in a pretty good location from the strip, and the staff was very helpful. They have a nice new pool facility, although the hot tub was too hot to sit in. Breakfast was good but a little crowded. Both mornings we stayed performers from some of the shows would come in during breakfast and promote their shows. One day it was one of the magicians that is currently on America's got talent. The other day a guy came and played guitar. Rooms are kind of small but beyond that a good experience.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Wendy R
Reviews.Content: The place was awesome and Mike at the front desk was amazing. He was soooo helpful and very friendly. He made us feel very welcome. Thanks for a great stay!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: Ray C
Reviews.Content: We had a group of 9 people using 6 rooms. Our first encounter was with CiCi on check in, getting us all squared away into our 6 rooms. Since we had two different check out times and we arrived at different times, CiCi went as far as calling me on my cell plone the first evening to make sure we all had our rooms. CiCi also arranged for all of us to be together in one room on one of our evenings at the Holiday Express Inn, she also came and took pictures of our group.. Larry was with her at the desk that evening and the two of them had big smiles and just made the stay so nice. Upon returning home I found I had left my cell phone in the room. When calling to make sure it was left there, Larry was the one who took the call and took the time to put the cell phone in a little box wrapped in bubble rap and I received the phone the next day. In this age, customer service seems to be very hard to find, but this Hotel seems to know what good customer service is all about. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Five Day Stay”
Reviews.Author: Sharon B
Reviews.Content: When we arrived on June 8-12 we were greeted by MIKE at the front desk. We found him to be friendly, courteous and very knowledgeable. Mike got us settled in after a long weary trip. We were so pleased with the accomodations of your hotel. The pool and sauna were great as was the room. The breakfasts were wonderful and the ladies very personable and friendly. We would recommend the Holiday Inn Express to any travelers. Thank you Mike and the rest of the staff for making our vacation even more special. Allen & Sharon Beyer Savanna, IL

Reviews.Title: “GREAT ROOM AND SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: Jeremy N
Reviews.Content: Being an employee of IHG I kinda know what to expect when I get a room. This was a very nice hotel and the staff at this property was very friendly. My girlfriend and I stay here for two nights and we couldn't have been any happier. I will be staying there again because you are close to everything Branson has to offer.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, but not the best HIE.”
Reviews.Author: gcjhss
Reviews.Content: Whenever we aren't staying in a cabin, we always stay at HIE hotels. This one is in a great location: just off the main road but close to a great putt-putt and good food locations. The staff was great. Even offered to plunge our toilet for us when it stopped up. The room had a huge spiderweb and the floors could have been a little cleaner, but not too bad for such a busy place. Federal discount kept the room down to $85 a night which was nice. The rooms seemed a little smaller than others I've stayed at; especially the bathrooms (which were very clean).Breakfast is good and the pool is super clean.

Reviews.Title: “Small room. Average Hotel. Would not stay here again.”
Reviews.Author: Cartman72
Reviews.Content: I stayed here two nights. This is an average hotel with small rooms. Although I cannot complain about it, I think there are better hotels in the area for the same price and cheaper hotels in the area for the same quality. Our room was small, and unexceptional. If you can find a good price for this hotel (less than $70 a night) which is hard to do, then it is OK. Otherwise I would stay at some of the cheaper hotels or go to the Radisson next door, or the Residence Inn or Ramada near by. Some of the local inns here that are cheaper would also be a better value.

Reviews.Title: “2 day stay - Silver Dollar City wih kids”
Reviews.Author: JetPlt
Reviews.Content: Wasn't quite sure if this was a new or old Holiday Inn. It actually appears to be both; an older hotel with major updates. When we arrived, the parking lot in front was being repaved, so we had to park in the back. Reception was complete and quick. The main lobby was spacious and bright. Our room was nice and clean. Shower was the cheap, plastic stepup type. The sink temp controls were reversed. Internet was wireless and was so slow that it was unusable. Breakfast was typical for Holiday Inn, with the exception of the pancake maker. Kids loved it. The food area ladies were very friendly and helpful. One of the biggest pluses was the pool and hot tub. Both were large and well maintained.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty good”
Reviews.Author: Chestersmomma
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for two nights. The room was very thoroughly cleaned in between nights. The breakfast had several options. Indoor pool/hot tub area was very nice. Very convenient location! Would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Guest of the Day”
Reviews.Author: Robert K
Reviews.Content: It is obvious that this hotel is striving for excellence. We have earned a status at Holiday Inn Express that entitles us to a free upgrade. The only problem is that we have never been upgraded. However, when we checked into this hotel we were "Guest of the Day", our name was on the marquee in the lobby and were automatically upgraded to a room with a hotub. Also, the breakfeast was very good.

Reviews.Title: “Just when they exceed expectations, they do more!”
Reviews.Author: bushlamo
Reviews.Content: Just returned from another two night trip to this great Branson hotel, and as always, they exceeded our expectations, and a bit more! The entire staff is always professional, friendly and eager to please. Not sure who some of the other reviewers are talking about for this hotel, but whoever they are, they are certainly not anyone we have encountered. Perhaps other reviewers are confusing this hotel with the one out on the Hwy. 76 strip, which, in our opinion, is less than desirable. The check-in is always efficient and friendly. This time, we had a special room request and they were very accomodating, as they always are. The hotel is clean, up to date, and the rooms are great with comfortable beds, nice showers and bathrooms and more than adequate amenities. Gotta love those jacuzzi suites after a long day of stomping around Branson! The breakfast is adequate and the staff of the breakfast room always does a great job. We have stated at this hotel many, many times and will continue to do so. There may be beter hotels in Branson, but we find no need to look for one as these folks do a wonderful job--thanks Sherry, CiCi, Michael and Jerry for a great time and a very pleasant stay!

Reviews.Title: “Always a great stay”
Reviews.Author: Ryan96St_Louis
Reviews.Content: My wife and our three younger children travel to Branson multiple times a year and we always enjoy our stay at this hotel. Staff was very courteous. Rooms are clean and comfortable and hotel is well built so you don't hear everyone around you. Breakfast had real eggs, bacon and biscuits and gravy not just some frozen egg patty. Attendant working in the breakfast room was very polite. The experience at this hotel is consistently great, would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Bvhappy
Reviews.Content: Beautiful lobby. Front desk staff was very friendly and checked us in promptly. They have a great indoor pool that the children loved. Breakfast was fine. There was one older lady that worked in the breakfast area that was VERY grouchy and snippy to the patrons. She obviously was very resentful to have to work there. The other breakfast staff was very friendly and patient with a large crowd. Linens were comfortable, comfy pillows. My iron didn't work and a replacement was brought up within 5 minutes of my call. It's probably time to start updating rooms a bit. There was mold in the grout between the tiles in the bathroom, chipped paint around the door and the transition piece between the room and bathroom was chipped up. These are small things but if they are let go, they will start to pile up and the hotel will become run down quickly. Overall we would definately stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, excellent breakfast”
Reviews.Author: MiloChin
Reviews.Content: Older building, but well maintained. Entire staff was excellent from the front desk to housekeeping. Show tickets are available from the iBranson office in the lobby. Don't waste your time with the vendors selling discount tickets, if you do the "tours". iBranson has discounted tickets without the hassel of wasting 90 minutes on a sales pitch. Also, they can get good seats at the last minute. Hot breakfast was excellent and choices changed daily.

Reviews.Title: “They did exceed my expectations”
Reviews.Author: William A
Reviews.Content: My wife and I travel 2500 miles each month on business. We try to stay at Holiday Inn brand hotels. We have done this for over 15 years. Some hotels are better than others. This one is the best. Because of our platinum priority club status, we frequently get an upgrade in accomodations. This hotel put us in the "Presidential Suite." It was wonderful. Since we were working and not on vacation, it was great to come "home" each night to this spacious suite and relax. This trip we were in 8 Holiday Inns in 14 days. Thankfully, we were able to enjoy this holtel for 5 of those days. Thank you HIE staff. Were looking forward to our visit in July.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice stay at the Holiday in Branson Mo!”
Reviews.Author: bigred1972
Reviews.Content: From the time I entered the Hotel the staff was professional and Polite. The front desk check in was fast,(Im a PC member) so it should be but it's not always that way. We were given the run down on the property, Indoor Pool and Hot tub, Breakfast served from 6-9:30, Business center, workout facility, Ticket office for shows in town. We were placed on the top floor which I like, less noise and given the WIFI sign on. The room was very clean and roomy enough, we had a two queen room for my wife, myself and our two children. The negative is the bathroom was small. The room had comfortable beds and pillows and a flat screen 26" Samsung TV. I usually bring a DVD to hook up for the kids and the TV had no video in only HDMI so I had to go to Walmart to buy an extra cable to hook it up but that was my fault. The cleaning staff let us down on the second day after being out of the room from 11am to 5pm eating, shopping and exploring around we returned to have our room not clean or made up, I was very disapointed. Overall the Holiday Inn express Green Mountain in Branson was a great Hotel, We go to Branson 2-3 times a year and I would rank it in the top 5.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to rest your feet, while the kids have funat the pool.”
Reviews.Author: dlaw9737
Reviews.Content: Our reservations were made online, and of course they varied in price when we arrived at the hotel, as they always do. I've never understood why the cyber world never connects with the real world. Anyway, it was quickly and cheerfully corrected by the intern woring the desk. The place looked very clean and pleasant. The room was clean and very adequate for my family of 4. Nothing was out of place with the restroom or the linens. My kids truly enjoyed the pool. Even though it is not the "castle rock" of Branson, it was at least warm and comforting at the end of a long days travel, unlike the "other" place. Breakfast the next morning was very good and it was put on by 2 very nice ladies who put out the effort to keep all who attended satisfied. Overall I was very pleased with my stay and will visit more in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: Missy B
Reviews.Content: I was responsible for finding a hotel in the Branson area for two 5th grade volleyball teams and their families and we chose this location. The families all seemed happy with their stay. The girls enjoyed the pool and the early morning complimentary breakfast was very helpful for them to start off the day of their tournament. The value of this stay was very good for the price. The hotel was nicely decorated and the staff was very good to us. I would definitely try to stay here again for future tournaments or vacations!

Reviews.Title: “Not bad but lacking in some areas”
Reviews.Author: jwoge
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews I felt reasonably comfortable booking this hotel. We usually stay at the Comfort Suites but they were closed being off-season. Basically this was your average hotel with some small issues. Over the phone I was offered the "Shopping Rate" of $54.99 but when my confirmation arrived they raised the price to $59.99. At check-in the front desk manager (very nice young woman) corrected this mistake immediately. Also, over the phone we were told this hotel had the same ammenities as its sister properties but that isn't the case. We really enjoy a sauna and were very disappointed to find out they do not have one at this location. The pool temp is also advertised at the front desk as 83 degrees....well I know the pool area was recently worked on so maybe their temp isn't quite up to what it should be but it is not anything near 83 degrees and neither is the whole pool area that temp. The room itself was tight with two SMALL (more like doubles) queens. I did not sleep well as I found the bed uncomfortable. The biggest issue were the long hairs I found in the tub when I went to shower the next morning. GROSS, housekeeping needs to double check their work. I guess one wouldn't be so bad but two in the tub and a few on the bath floor were unacceptable. There was also a slight issue with breakfast. The first day we were informed by the kitchen lady (very nice, both of them) that both the pancake and juice machines were not working. Not that I expect a lot from hotel breakfasts but if this is one of the main items you offer then no matter how many people are in the hotel (off season or not) it should be in working condition. We did forget a few items at home (comb, toothbrush, etc.) and they did provide that to us. All in all, not a bad stay but they have their issues.

Reviews.Title: “Great room”
Reviews.Author: Fran L
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel with friendly, helpful staff. My room was clean and quiet. I was surprised by a phone call from the front desk asking if everything was ok....wow, that was nice. I would definetely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “No Need To Look Further”
Reviews.Author: turtleladyMo
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for great customer service, this hotel is number one! Great location, very clean, nicely decorated, refrigerator in room was added bonus. Hot breakfast with many choices. Small gift shop with capability for purchasing show tickets. We even received a call soon after our arrival to make sure everything in our room was satisfactory! This is where we stay whenever we visit Branson! Staff is friendly, helpful and you even receive smiles and eye contact!!! This Holiday Inn Express should NOT be confused with the other one located on the Hwy 76 strip. Difference is like night and day.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, newer Holiday Inn”
Reviews.Author: Macy440
Reviews.Content: Great location. Very friendly, helpful staff. The front desk even called after I was settled in to make sure I was happy with my room. This is a clean room with basic amenities. I would definately stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Steve N
Reviews.Content: This my families first stay at this location in Branson. Definitely better than the Holiday Inn on the 'Strip.' Very nice two-story lobby with very friendly and helpful staff. Our room was large and nicely appointed (jacuzzi, refrigerator, etc.). And it had plenty of electrical outlets, a must for recharging phones, iPads, etc. Free breakfast was typical, as was the lack of space. I have yet to find a 'free breakfast' hotel with adequate space for eating. But I would definitely stay here again when in Branson. Great location; quite; excellent room; helpful staff.

Reviews.Title: “Just what you'd expect”
Reviews.Author: GC967
Reviews.Content: It's a Holiday Inn Express. If you want a Four Seasons go to one. It was clean except for some dust, the employees were nice and very helpful. There was a FREE (so don't complain) breakfast that was reasonably good. Great location and comfortable beds. Microwave and refrigerator in room. And QUIET! We were next door to the breakfast room, I was surprised the first morning to see a bus load of people eating... I hadn't heard a thing until I opened the door. Nice!!

Reviews.Title: “A good choice for Branson”
Reviews.Author: Wayne M
Reviews.Content: There are many hotels to choose, but start by looking on Green Mountain Dr. That was a big plus for this otherwise average hotel. Wall a/c leaked cold air from the outside in its ill fitting cabinet. Floodlights on the exterior light the hotel and the rooms. What idiot architect devised this. Go home, do the same and tell me it makes sense. Breakfast was quite good and beds were comfortable. Would stay again in Branson and take advantage of the back routes off this street.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing.”
Reviews.Author: E4178
Reviews.Content: We called in to extend our stay prior to our arrival and were given a $30 per night reduction......this really wasn't enough. The hotel was "updated" a year ago however it was done in a very unapppealing color scheme and it had a "cheap" feel to it. The rooms were small compared to other hotel chains we have used. The location was good and the pool size was nice. The breakfast was average. The internet service was not reliable during two of the three evenings. We had a microwave the didn't work but it was replaced the next morning.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel and great value”
Reviews.Author: Momof2boysathome
Reviews.Content: Stayed there with my husband and two sons. Indoor pool was excellent. Room was clean and comfortable. Staff was very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Scott J
Reviews.Content: Starting with checking in, the experience was perfect. The room was clean and spacious. The staff was friendly and fun. Would recommend to anyone going to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “good value”
Reviews.Author: charlesodonnell
Reviews.Content: There are two holiday Inns in Branson, this is the better of the two. Good staff, clean, comfortable, and a good value! I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “This HIE is exceptional”
Reviews.Author: mtnhykr
Reviews.Content: Stay here, you wont be disappointed. Part of the Myer Hotels group, ugraded existing structure and the service is great. Well appointed rooms, clean, breakfast very good, use of house computer, very good houskeeping, located off 76 so in a more quiet area. Will likely stay here again while visiting Branson.

Reviews.Title: “where not to stay”
Reviews.Author: jim r
Reviews.Content: beads are extra - extra firm, be softer to sleep on the floor plug in's on the desk was worn out and did not work the no-fault breaker at the vanity was falling of the wall the heater has a real bad odder vanity in the bath room is damaged price is double what it is worth the person at the desk said 50% of the desk lights do not work

Reviews.Title: “How may I exceed your expectations?”
Reviews.Author: marijo40_11
Reviews.Content: That's how they answer the phone and they really do mean it. We stayed three nights and found that every single person working there really wanted to make your visit a good one. My only complaint is there weren't enough electrical outlets in the room. They had two on lamps but my cell phone charger didn't fit on either so I had to charge it in the bathroom. The plugs were intended for standard plugs, not these fancy transformer things that most phones have today. Also, some bananas for breakfast would be nice. We old people need our potassium.

Reviews.Title: “Great weekend in Branson.”
Reviews.Author: Joshau
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this Hotel and found it friendly, safe and close to everything. The staff was very helpful in giving direction and answering all of our questions. This is the best Holiday In in Southwest, MO.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Quiet, Friendly and mercifully off the strip!”
Reviews.Author: asiapointriders
Reviews.Content: 14 year old daughter and I spent one hot August night at the Holiday Inn Express, Green Mountain Drive, in Branson, MO. Two very important qualities to look for when when visiting Branson in August are: a) get off but stay near the 20/7 traffic-jammed strip; and b) find a place with great air conditioning that will keep you cool without keeping you awake all night. We have stayed in placed where the a/c started and stopped all night, waking us with every start and smothering in warm humidity when it stopped. The Holiday Inn Express, Green Mountain (note- there is another location ON the strip, which we have never visited) was perfect. We were greeted by Dan who immediately offered show info but never pushed when we explained we were visiting friends, not shows, and gave me a cute little welcome bag for being a Priority Club member. The room was spacious, sparkling clean, and the beds were really comfortable. The pool was totally empty, a shock for this time of year, but clean and just the right temp. The hot tub was warm, bubbly, and a great spot for relaxing. There is a nifty outdoor sunning area outside the pool with the most unusual comfy looking chairs. We were happy where we were, but you should try those chairs -- not your average vinyl. They looked like something you would find in a 4-star hotel or better. We didn't try breakfast this time; neither of us were hungry but the in-room coffee was, well, it was there. It wasn't Starbucks but they may have had great coffee in the breakfast room. Great value, great stay. We'll be there again next month!

Reviews.Title: “Was very great”
Reviews.Author: tami2011
Reviews.Content: Room was very clean and the staff was very helpful with every aspect of our stay. Informed us of entertainment and supplied coupons. The breakfast was very good and was never the same thing. Will stay there again and would like to let everyone know the hotel is very convenient to all entertainment

Reviews.Title: “Very unfriendly staff, not helpfull”
Reviews.Author: Michael A
Reviews.Content: We were not greeted, had to bang on the desk to get someone. They were eating a sandwich while they checked us in. They did not honor our confirmed reservation. They made no attempt to help. The room was not clean, and they said that was all they had. Sorry I stayed the night, should have left and found something else. We have stayed at many Holiday Inn Expresses and always been very pleased. This was our first bad experience with a Holiday Inn Express.

Reviews.Title: “Always a Good place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Mommy51
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here SEVERAL times when visiting Branson. We have ALWAYS had a nice stay here...never had a problem with anything. Clean, quiet and friendly. The lady that works the breakfast area is so nice! The king beds are wonderfully comfortable. There are fridge and microwaves in the room, which we really like. The parking lot is fairly level. Also, the location is great...very easy to get to shows, yet not right on the main drag.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jim65bh
Reviews.Content: Every aspect of this location is top-notch, from the extras in the breakfast room to the superior service from every employee. Our five days was flawless. Great facility, perfectly maintained, wonderful pool, everything top notch. Great internet service too. Two fast elevators. Lots of luggage carts. Ticket sales on site, great lobby. Indoor pool with available outdoor seating.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, good price...”
Reviews.Author: RanDebbie
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Holiday Inn Green Mountain Drive in August 2011. Rooms were very clean, staff friendly, free hot breakfast was pretty good. Pool clean and pool area very well kept. We would definitely go back and tell friends to stay here as well.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: mrfast120
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed the spacious room with the Jacuzzi tub. It was a big room with flat screen tv and comfortable king size bed. The motel also has a nice indoor pool and Jacuzzi, and serves a hot breakfast in the mornings----but it was kinda bland! This motel is a little more expensive than some of the motels in Branson and it's also not located on the main 76 strip with all the shows, but it's not that much of an inconvenience due to the easy access of the Green mountain road. For a nice relaxing weekend this place is hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: “Definetly will be staying here on my next trip to Branson.”
Reviews.Author: MoonPieMommie
Reviews.Content: We so enjoyed our stay at Holiday Inn Green Mtn Dr. The beds were the most comfortable I have ever encountered in a hotel. The hotel was extremely busy during our stay with a soft ball tournament staying there but managed to have plenty of items for breakfast and such and even serving past the closing time. Huge pool and fantastic sun deck. Rooms very clean and nice. Loved the double sink area alot. It made getting ready much easier with my kids.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay for our 25th Anniversary!”
Reviews.Author: sgrice6
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay here! The staff were all so friendly. We needed extra hangers for our clothes and called the front desk and they were quickly delivered to the room. Our room was a king jacuzzi suite and was very nice. The room was clean and very pleasant to look at. The bathroom and shower were of a good size to be comfortable. The room was on the 5th floor and air condition worked very well and the room was cool despite the very hot weather. The tv was a nice sized flat screen. The mattress was very comfortable and I have a bad back and don't always sleep too well in beds other than my own. The breakfast was very good. It had a good selection of cereals, eggs, sausage or ham, gravy toast, muffins, biscuits, coffee , milk, tea, juice. My husband loved the cinnamon rolls. You have got to try these rolls! This is the nicest hotel I have ever stayed in with this price range. I have stayed in Hilton's that were much more expensive and had a few more amenities but the staff were no more friendly and the hotel was no more clean than this one. I would certainly stay again and we loved our vacation in Branson. The location of this hotel is very close to most everything but not on the main strip in town which made it quieter and easier to go to/from the hotel. There is shopping, mini golf, a gas station, and restaurants all nearby. Thankyou for a great 25th Anniversary stay!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kenneth M
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is very clean and quiet, it is the only place I will stay in Branson. I also recommend it to anyone looking for a great place to stay. The beds are comfortable, the breakfast is good, and the service is amazing. Thanks M. LaRiviere for making my stay the best in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel Will stay again”
Reviews.Author: kslady56
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this HIE July 26 and 27. Very clean and nice people running it. We reserved a room with double beds since we had our grandson with us. Husband ask for a suite but the only one they had was with a jacuzzi and he didin't think we needed a jucuzzi. Husband is a platinium card holder throught HIE. They usually upgrade you without you having to ask but that was no big deal to us this time. Upon getting to our room it seemed so small for the three of us. So husband went back down to desk to see if we could get the suite with the king bed and they said yes. That was nice of them to do this. We had plenty of room in the king for all three of us, it did have a pull out couch just didn't use it. Grandson loved the jacuzzi. Room was very clean and nice. Fridge and microwave. Bed was comfortable. I didn't ever get to the breakfast but husband did and said it was good. We did go to the pool for a nice swim. Over all I would recommend this hotel and will probably stay there again next time in Branson. This hotel is very close to Lone Star and 2 miniature golf courses. We liked the location of hotel because you can go either way out of drive and get to the strip. Enjoy if you stay here.

Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE”
Reviews.Author: ohXbliss
Reviews.Content: I hated this place. Room was filthy. Staff was utterly rude. Ants all over the vanity in bathroom. I will definitely be staying elsewhere next time I'm in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Expected better from Holiday Inn”
Reviews.Author: JBG1972
Reviews.Content: We left early each day for Silver Dollar City, our room was not serviced before returning in the evening, after 5pm. The hotel completely ran out of towels one day. Only one small bottle of shampoo for a family of four, had to request extra each day. The air unit made floor wet and smelled bad on the last day. I reported all to front desk and was told they were busier than expected, no apology offered at any time.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: ammo14
Reviews.Content: Stayed 6d and 5nts and love it was on the side road in Branson not the main drag. Plan on staying there whenever in Branson excellent service and they had a great staff.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel.we'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: vhale001
Reviews.Content: Outstanding accomodations, Breakfast and Service Staff !

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: sightseer55
Reviews.Content: Very nice, helpful staff. Fast, efficient check in/out. Very good quality and selection of breakfast items. Able to purchase discounted show tickets at desk. Location convenient to everything. Several places within easy walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “PEOPLE THAT GO ABOVE AND BEYOND TO BE HELPFUL”
Reviews.Author: DAVISFAMILY77
Reviews.Content: I cannot tell you how pleased we were with the staff, they did everything they could to make our trip exciting and comfortable...Sheri was so pleasant and sweet.. Danny was very understanding...not to many places have staff members that go above and beyond to make a families trip comfortable and exciting. I would like to take the time to thank the full staff of the Holiday inn express hotel God Bless you all Davis Family Ps. if you are looking for a clean roomy nice hotel with a wonderful staff this is the place to stay we were located on the one on green mountain drive..

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: DaLaR1
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a great place to stay in a nice, central location. The staff were very helpful and made our stay, and our vacation a great experience. Michael at the front desk was spot on with his recommendations for things to do (and not do) while in town. We feel we got the best deal for our money because, based on his recommendations, we never had a bad experience with a show, eatery, or shopping center. Stop by and ask for Michael, especially if it is your first time in Branson and you don't know what to do in town. Love the indoor pool and the rooms were very nice. Thanks guys.

Reviews.Title: “An enjoyable three nights”
Reviews.Author: JoefromOklahoma
Reviews.Content: This hotel was amazingly quiet in spite of being full. The pool was nice. The breakfast was very good. The hotel is conveniently located. I have already recommended it to a friend. Everyone on the staff was friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location!"”
Reviews.Author: Penelope1975
Reviews.Content: I researched many of the Branson hotels before our trip. After reading the reviews from fellow TA members, and consulting the map, we chose the Holiday Inn Express on Green Mountain Drive. The location could not have been better. It was very easy to get to, thanks to Ray Napier at the Branson Tourism Center. The traffic in Branson was not what I expected it to be. It was quite manageable...no long waits, or impatient drivers. Because the hotel is located off 76, it is extrememly quiet. There were the usual breakfast choices in the second floor dining area. Our room was on the" second" floor...actually ground level when you drive around the hotel to park and enter the building. There was no problem getting on and off 76, because of the lights and the turn lanes. It did not take us any more than ten minutes to get to any of the shows that were located on 76. There is an inside pool, which we did not use. The rooms have a flat screen tv, mini refrig, and a microwave. The bathroom was small, but adequate. It had another sink outside the bathroom area. The free wi-fi internet was stonger at different times of the day from our room. I did not log on from the lobby/public areas. All in all, I would definitely stay here again when we return to Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Impressive Facility and Staff”
Reviews.Author: GHanstein
Reviews.Content: This is a LUXURY Express Hotel. I was impressed with the appearance and neatness of the facility. The amenities were top notch; includes full breakfast and the most comfortable beds! The hotel staff was very professional. They were happy to help and provide input on things to do in Branson (never a shortage) and how to get around town, too. I will most definitely return to this hotel. Plan a trip here and ENJOY!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: junebug2056
Reviews.Content: My family and I spent 4 days at Holiday Inn Express and had a most comfortable stay. The staff is friendly and helpful. In fact, My daughter left her purse on a table on the second floor and a nice lady turned it in to the front desk. Sherry, at front desk, called us to let us know it had been turned in. It was quiet and rooms were kept clean and orderly. We will return to this Holiday Inn on our next trip to Branson. Thank you Sherry for making our stay so enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay! Do not hesitate to book!”
Reviews.Author: ARKevin
Reviews.Content: This Holiday Inn Express is a great value. The rooms are clean and housekeeping did an outstanding job each day of our stay. Check-in was a breeze and entire staff was very friendly. The location is outstanding...close to the main strip. It's easy to get around using the color-coded route system. Here's a tip....buy your tickets for shows and attractions at hotel. I purchased a two-day ticket for Silver Dollar City for the price of a single day day ticket...that ticket was not available at the theme park. The indoor pool is nice and well maintained and towels are available pool side. I would not hestitate to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay!!”
Reviews.Author: MEP97
Reviews.Content: After driving 8 hours to Branson when we were expecting a 6 hour drive (thanks yahoo) it was so great to stay here! We were exhausted and had not gotten a motel yet (since we thought we would be there earlier we planned on finding one after we checked out the area. I went in and asked if they had any rooms available and the gentleman told me about a managers special. Sounded good, then I asked if we could get non smoking ( I have asthma) and was told the motel was 100% non smoking I told him SOLD! The lobby was beautiful and bright. We stayed in room 422 (4th floor). Even though the parking lot was very full it was very quiet. Clean and just right with 2 queen beds which were the MOST COMFORTABLE BEDS EVER (didnt want to get out of bed at all!), refrigerator, microwave, and coffee pot. Nice size bathroom with great water pressure and plenty of hot water. 2 adults and1 child all took a shower before we left. 2 sinks which is very handy as well. Breakfast was really good, biscuits and gravy with ham, potatoes that had red and green peppers and some spice, pancakes, eggs, cereals, juice, milk, coffee and cinnamon rolls. Breakfast room was a bit small and run out of tables but they kept up with the food supply! Pool inside was also nice and clean with a lot of space. Water was a bit cold for our liking but we enjoyed swimming anyway :-). When we asked they let us stay an extra hour so our daughter could swim since we had gotten in so late the night before and was unable to. Everyone was very helpful and friendly. If we get to go back to Branson this is where we will stay again. Very pleased and want one of those mattresses for my house!!!! Thanks for giving us a much needed good night sleep and a great visit to Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Very attractive; good location”
Reviews.Author: pibi63040
Reviews.Content: We usually stay in Hilton or Marriott properties, but had a "reward" night to use-or-lose with IC hotels. Very impressed! Attractive hotel and attractive rooms with fridge and micro -- always appreciated! Older son liked the pillows embroidered (soft) or (firm). Though we did not use the pool, it looked pleasant and the furniture looked comfy! From our room on the top floor we could see nice loungers in the outdoor area looking into the pool, The 2nd floor breakfast room overlooked the pool area, too, which opened up the feel of the breakfast area. During our stay, there was no fruit available and the pancake maker was not working, but my husband and kids really liked the cinnamon rolls! There is an agent selling show tickets in the lobby, which looked convenient, though we did not use this service because we already had tickets. Nice location. Good experience overall!

Reviews.Title: “Great Room... Bad Shower!!”
Reviews.Author: agarrison84
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for the Memorial Day weekend. This was somewhat of a last minute trip, I called about a week before to reserve a room & clerk told me the only king bed that had availed was in what they called the "penthouse suite". He was able to give me a pretty good price on it so thinking it was going to be a great room I went for it. It was a nice room with a small kitchen,( with fridge that leaked inside) large living room & separate bedroom. There was a Jacuzzi tub in the same room as the bedroom which seemed very nice, we never used it. Now, the shower & toilet was a total different story. I was not pleased AT ALL. The shower was like a cube in the wall with a curtain hanging in front of it. There was a very small ledge in the shower, only big enough to set the hotel sized shampoo & body wash bottles on. The toilet had it own room with door but it was pointless to try and close the door. It was so small!!! The door cleared the toilet by INCHES!! There was no way to be in there and shut the door. I’m a pretty average size woman & it was hard even for me. There is no way a person of a large size could go in & shut the door. I don’t understand the design of the shower/toilet being so small when the rest of the room was so large! We will NOT book this room again, we would probably try this hotel again because the location was perfect. If we stay here again we will book a standard king room if they have a full bath/shower and normal toilet space. The breakfast was I’m sure great, because there were so many people packed in there eating & waiting in line to get food. We decided to skip it because there was so many people in there, I’m sure it was because of the holiday.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: TexasTraveler707
Reviews.Content: We were here for 1 night only. Room was clean and ready for us at 4 pm. Front desk was very helpful, and courteous. Complementary breakfast was very well stocked, and the quality of the offerings was good. Everyone in the family enjoyed the stay.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Experience”
Reviews.Author: ksleo161
Reviews.Content: We traveled on a family vacation and stayed at this hotel at the suggestion of a friend, very glad we did. Michael the desk clerk was an amazing person. He was so helpful and gracious with every request we made, and went beyond to address my concerns with the interesting weather patterns in the area. The hotel was clean at every turn, very modern decor, free wireless, and a great pancake machine. Did I mention the pancakes. We will always stay at this hotel and just hope mike is our guy when we get there. Thank you Branson we had a great time.

Reviews.Title: “A COMFORTING, RELALXING AND ENJOYABLE EXPERIENCE DURING A STRESSFUL TIME.”
Reviews.Author: Heronscove
Reviews.Content: We are from the Branson area and had to stay in a hotel for a week because of flooding in our home. This Holiday Inn Express was exceptional in all respects! We loved the staff! EVERYONE was always there with a helping hand and a friendly smile! The varied hot breakfasts were yummy and our room was always very clean. The pool and surrounding area was great--large with comfortable furniture and a nice hot tub! (Definitely a nice place to go after a long day of flood related work)! Another positive was that it was close to really good restaurants and activities. In summary, our stay at this hotel Holiday Inn Express was "Just what the doctor ordered!"

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bob_Smith27023
Reviews.Content: We had an outstanding stay at this hotel and heartily recommend it to anyone. The staff were extremely helpful and the rooms were spotless and kept that way by the cleaning staff.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best HI Express Hotels!”
Reviews.Author: DrivinTheBurb
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in Branson several times, and at different hotels, with mixed satisfaction. I like HI Express in general, so I was happy to find this one on Green Mountain Drive. It's off the main drag, so that famous Branson Gridlock will not be a problem here, but it's still close to shows and attractions. This hotel has a great pool area, video games for kids, the usual good beds and free internet. But that BREAKFAST!!! I have never had home fried potatoes at a HI Express, but someone here was busy cooking - sausage, biscuits, gravy, bacon, eggs, home fried potatoes, and of course the usual bagels, cinnamon rolls, juices and coffee. The bountiful breakfast was like a breakfast buffet at a restaurant or full-service hotel. And, it was FREE. This HI Express was originally a different brand, so the bathroom is a bit smaller than the standard, but it has a sink both inside and outside the bathroom, which prevents traffic jams there. We booked two rooms for two families - one with an infant, one with a teenager. The in-room fridge and microwave were a hit with the young family - easy to warm up things for the baby and keep her food safely cold. The pool was a big hit with the teenager. There is a travel desk on site, where you can get tickets to shows, so you can arrive here without any idea of what to do in Branson, and they can help you out. The staff at the desk and in the travel office were all excellent. As a Priority Club member (easy to sign up - do it!) I was given the courtesy of a 2 pm checkout, which was great with the baby. We were able to get her nap done, then go see the 3 pm Chinese Acrobats show on our way out of town. I was very pleased with every aspect of this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “This is the best hotel in Branson for customer service and cleanliness!”
Reviews.Author: awagoh7
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I traveled to Branson to spend a few days and nights in April to shop. We were treated so graciously and check in was a breeze. We had a very nice room and was very impressed by everyone that worked there. We were greeted wherever we went in the hotel and made to feel welcome. The morning buffet was very good and we had abundant dishes to choose from! We so enjoyed our stay we plan on staying here every time we come to Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel in Branson”
Reviews.Author: LuckyGirlBlue84
Reviews.Content: I loved the location of this hotel. It is off of the main strip, which makes traffic lighter and it's not a hassle to get to. The hotel lobby is beautiful and inviting. The staff made us feel very welcome and were extremely helpful. The room was clean and the breakfast in the morning was way more than what I expected! I will definitely be staying here from now on whenever I go to Branson, which is usually a few times a year.

Reviews.Title: “Customer care is #1 priority”
Reviews.Author: inaholland4
Reviews.Content: Good location -- just down the hill a bit and behind Grand Palace, so it's close to so many shows and restaurants. Beautiful lobby! Friendly, caring staff - about 30 minutes after checking in, they even called us to see if we were settled in our room ok and if we needed anything. Very clean, comfortable, quiet room & bathroom, plenty of towels and other necessities. Bountiful hot & cold breakfast. Wide variety--They even had hard boiled eggs and skim milk which is sometimes hard to find. Good workout room, clean indoor pool & hot tub. Can't think of one thing negative to say about it.We'll definitely stay there again.Good view from all rooms except those facing the pool area.

Reviews.Title: “We had a great stay!”
Reviews.Author: Crafttrips
Reviews.Content: We truly enjoyed our stay here! The rooms are standard Holiday Inn rooms, but ours also had a fridge, which was a huge help to us....we have little ones with allergies and always have to take quite a bit of food on trips. We checked in at the desk with Danny, who was fabulous. And we LOVED Kathy at breakfast - she was so sweet and helpful. My husband travels frequently and said that was by far the best breakfast he's had at a Holiday Inn. We will definitely be staying at this one again!

Reviews.Title: “Unexpected pleasant Surprise!”
Reviews.Author: jo-a-riggs
Reviews.Content: We spent two nights at the Holiday Inn Express. My expectations for a motel are clean rooms, good service, pleasant staff. What we got was more than that. We were with a group, traveling by bus. My roommate and I wanted oranges and the convenience store was farther away than we wanted to walk. The desk clerk learned that we were looking for oranges; when we came back to our room about 9:30 p.m., there was a bag of oranges in our room. That's the kind of gesture that causes a person to pass the word on that the Holiday Inn Express in Branson is the place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is in a great location in Branson and awesome for families.”
Reviews.Author: jeffandbettyberens
Reviews.Content: When we arrived in Branson, we scouted 5 different hotels to stay at, comparing rates and room ammenities. When we walked into the Holiday Inn Express (Green Mountain), we were greeted by Sherri. She was very customer service oriented and did an excellent job in making our decision to want to stay at this hotel for the next six nights. We chose a king suite, which had a microwave & fridge, jacuzzi hot tub, pull-out sleeper. This room was very large and fit this family of 5 very well. The room was very clean and everything was in good working condition. They have an absolutely AWESOME hot breakfast in the morning from 6:30AM-9:30AM and it's "free". Eggs, Bacon, Biscuits, Muffins, Cereal, OJ, Coffee, Cinnamin Rolls, Bagels, Toast, Yogurt, Fruit, Danishes, Milk, Coffee. The pool and hot tub are indoor and also awesome!! All of the cleaning staff was super friendly and went above and beyond whenever we needed something. We would highly recommend this hotel to all of you. When we return to Branson, we will be staying here!!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant enough”
Reviews.Author: mota73
Reviews.Content: Stayed for one night in end of March. Room was clean, staff was friendly. Stayed here about 10 years ago and it's been updated some. Beds were very comfy and breakfast was pretty decent. We paid around $100 including tax with AAA discount- which I felt was an ok price. There are so many places in Branson though - it didn't leave such an impression on me that I would book it again instead of trying somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Best of Branson”
Reviews.Author: yellowcat3
Reviews.Content: This was a nice surprise for spring break. Great breakfast, pool area, the front desk was beyond helpful. Got all our show tickets at the lobby gift shop seemed the prices were better or equal to online. Love the coffee all day long in the lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, but not the best.”
Reviews.Author: VPNor
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a great place to stay but is very "average". Nothing special that deserves "extra" praises. The hotel is nicely kept up and is very clean. The staff, except for managmeent, is very friendly and accomidating - but does not handle "unusual" situations or requests very well. If you have anything out of the norm, be prepared to not get it and accept plain and simple/basic service. This property is great if you are a family traveling with kids or a senior "bus group". With this said, if you are not ok with a crowded breakfast buffet set up, pool, elevator, front desk, and business center, this is not the place for you. Staffing was limited-the housekeepers did not do the stay over rooms until after 5 pm one day and the housekeeper blamed it on being under staffed and over worked. Another negative was the hot tub. It was broken and each day we were told the part was coming in the next day. Note-It stayed broken the entire time of my 5 day/4 night trip. Also, DO NOT EXPECT TO GET POINTS if you book any type of group rate, tour group, use a travel agency, etc--they will not do it. Holiday Inn Priorty Club suggested that I speak to hotel management about this, and after I did this, the GM himself did not do anything about it. Priority Club has recently apologized for this and has compensated my points and apologized for the hotel's inability to do this. Remember this is a FRANCHISE H I Express, which means it is not run/owned by ICT hotels/Holiday Inn. If you want simple, this is your place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: JRBilly
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel with my 8 year old son on Spring break. Great room, lots of space, great family atmosphere, and great location. Would recommend and stay at this hotel again. However if you need fast Wi Fi you won't get it here. The speed was less than dial-up but then again we were on vacation..maybe a sign I shouldn't be bothered with work.

Reviews.Title: “Service above and beyond”
Reviews.Author: lizSpearfish
Reviews.Content: The service and friendliness of front-desk staff was outstanding. Due to the need for more room because of my husband's oxygen equipment, we were offered a suite at the same price. Another example of concern for guests was shown when the assistant manager immediately found a dentist to see me when I had a severe toothache. I can't imagine any better treatment than what we received., Also great service and friendliness from the breakfast attendant.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel Great Service”
Reviews.Author: lintlee
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel, beautiful entry, continental breakfast with eggs, meat, potatoes, etc. The staff were very pleasant and helpful. Michael at the front desk was outstanding as he helped us pick out the best shows, restaurants and museums. Highly recommend. We would definitely go back!

Reviews.Title: “Our winter "getaway" was perfect thanks to the courtesy of staff & especially the night manager, Danny.”
Reviews.Author: kylie44
Reviews.Content: Our rooms were clean. The breakfast buffet was fresh and the indoor pool was great.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and great service”
Reviews.Author: cwalker1
Reviews.Content: We are travel agents and have visted many hotels. This stay was one of the best very clean rooms and great breakfast. Very nice front desk service and modern workout area and clean pool. fast internet . when we go to branson this is where we are going to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing Stay”
Reviews.Author: CMWar
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Holiday Inn Express was very enjoyable, the refrigerator was a pleasant surprise because this was not available in other Holiday Inn Express.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money. Would have stayed longer if we could...”
Reviews.Author: Muluvisitor
Reviews.Content: This is a real gem of a place! Economical, spacious and with all the full range of services and functions you expect from a 5-star hotel. We had a King-sized bed room with a hot tub (which worked wonderfully!) for a fraction of the price of the HI-Express room we took in Osage Beach. It was a really comfortable room in which we could have happily lived in for a whole week if time permitted. There was free fast wifi accessible from within the room, and free breakfast buffet (fairly standard fare). There were only 2 irksome issues, which I believe the management should work on: a] The room we had reeked of stale cigarette smoke. When we complained about it, all we were told was that the hotel was a smoke free facility, and there was no attempt to verify our complaints, or to help us find a solution. b] On the day we left, the New Year's eve thunderstorm was just about passing over, and we couldn't get to the car because of the heavy rain. When we tried to borrow an umbrella from the counter staff, there was little more than a shrug of shoulders and a lame excuse that the umbrellas were all out. Again there was not attempt to help us find a solution. In the end I had to borrow a towel from a passing bell boy, so that I could make a dash in the pelting rains to the car. I don't think these are problems related to the hotel itself, as on we had a much more helpful encounter with the counter staff on arrival. Perhaps, the hotel could better instruct the staff with respect to how to best provide service. Because of these however, I would have to downgrade the service feedback to 3 stars. Otherwise it is a really great hotel to stay in.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: Tripforgrad
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay at this hotel. The breakfast was good each morning. Cathy did a superior job of keeping the food freshly stocked at all times. She was very friendly nad offered warm greetings every morning we were there. When we wanted to sleep in there was no pounding on the door by housekeeping to disturb us...thank you for that!!! We loved and appreciated the Nativity in front of the hotel. My husband loves to swim and sit in the hot tub for his back. The pool water temperature was too cold and the hot tub wasn't warm enough. We stayed in an executive room for the microwave and refrigerator. I think all the rooms will be getting refrigerators and microwaves sometime in the future. Hopefully they can improve on the hot tub and pool. The staff was very friendly and helpful. This is a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Best Place to Stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: micotex
Reviews.Content: From the time we walked in the front door, everyone behind the front desk was friendly. They gave us a bag of bottled water, snacks, and coupons, which was a nice touch. The room was clean, had fridge and microwave. The breakfast was good (typical HI Express--sausage, eggs, gravy and continental stuff too.) We have stayed at cheaper hotels in Branson and this was worth spending a few extra dollars. The location was great too, accessible from other roads than having to take the main strip the whole way. We would stay there again for our next Branson trip.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding”
Reviews.Author: TiffTot6
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very accomodating! The breakfast, beds, and pool were fantastic!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: toodlesxo
Reviews.Content: I thought the nativity in front of the hotel was a nice touch. We would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely the Greatest!”
Reviews.Author: bushlamo
Reviews.Content: This is the second time we have stayed at this hotel since it was taken over by new owners and new management. It continues to be our favorite of the many hotels to choose from in Branson. This time, took a king-jacuzzi suite, and it was super. Very clean, comfortable bed, nice bathroom and the jacuzzi in the corner was wonderful after walking about Branson all day. The price of the room was a bargain too! The staff at this hotel continues to be friendly and professional and the breakfast is one of the best included breakfasts we have had at any hotel, and we travel a lot. Keep up the good work folks, and rest assured you have made believers out of us--we won't even look at other places in Branson anymore. Thanks for a job well done!

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay in Branson!!”
Reviews.Author: blmb
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel twice and both times the staff has been incredible and the rooms very nice and comfortable. The breakfast is great, too! Will always stay here everytime we go to Branson!!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel had excellent service, a fantastic room, and great breakfast!!”
Reviews.Author: weluv2travel621
Reviews.Content: My husband & I stayed here for Thanksgiving weekend. I will start by saying I am very picky about hotels and am disappointed if the room is not great. The room we stayed in was absolutely fantastic!! We got the Jacuzzi room. It was very, very large room with one part being the bedroom area and another being the living room area. Then, to top it off a very nice two person jacuzzi was in the corner. The room was very updated, nicely decorated, and clean. The separate bathroom had been somewhat updated, but not totally. The service at this hotel was exceptional. They even called our room about an hour after we got there to see if everything was okay and ask if we needed anything. The rest of the hotel is very nice with a workoout room with new equipment, really nice lobby and nice indoor pool area. They provide a great full breakfast every morning with eggs, biscuits, gravy, bacon, sausage, pastries, juice, etc. I never have reveiwed a hotel before but I cannot say enough good things about this one. A++++

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: ahorvath01
Reviews.Content: We spent three nights here and had a wonderful experience. The room was clean and the staff was friendly. The hotel is located in a perfect location for navigating Branson. The included breakfast was excellent. I would recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Overly Nice”
Reviews.Author: Libra160766
Reviews.Content: The hotel was beautifully decorated with Christmas decor. It was five minutes from Tanger. Great location near Walmart, McDonalds. Staff was overly nice. My husband needed to send off an important document ASAP. Hotel staff helped him with making copies and directly him to the nearest FedEx. I have stayed at three other hotels in Branson (Hampton Inn, Melody Lane, Best Western Landing) and this hotel has been the best so far. Great price. Nice rooms. Great breakfast buffet and once again great location. This hotel is near the main strip but it is not in a busy location.

Reviews.Title: “It was an excellent experience, and I will stay there on every trip to Branson, MO”
Reviews.Author: Eddie027
Reviews.Content: Very friendly people that tried to make our stay a pleasant experience. The rooms were great. The food exceeded our expectations. Overall wonderful experience.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel Experience”
Reviews.Author: KatWal
Reviews.Content: Service was wonderful. Front desk, housekeeping, and breakfast room personnel were very friendly, accomodating, and concerned. The room was clean and neat and large enough to not feel crowded. It was located close to attractions, restaurants and shopping. There was laundry services for long stays and the pool was newly enclosed. It was decorated beautifully for the holidays. The only bad experience I had was my room located directed above where the buses loaded and unloaded and bus engines are rather noisy. Fortunately it did not last long at a time. I was very pleased with this Holiday Inn Express and would gladly stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Property has been recently remolded. Loved the Cleanliness”
Reviews.Author: quinmo
Reviews.Content: We had such a great time. Our room was perfect, the staff went out of their way to make our stay pleasureable, plus the exercise and swimming areas had a great location. Also the full American Breakfast was just marvelous.

Reviews.Title: “Great Getaway”
Reviews.Author: KST8R
Reviews.Content: I have always trusted the Holiday Inn Express name. This location is perhaps the best yet. I stay here each time I go to Branson and Silver Dollar City. It is located close to all the attractions yet off the strip which allows the traveler to get around the town easily on the alternate routes. The best part of this stay though was meeting Cathy in the breakfast area. What a gem!!! The room was overcrowded with more people coming in constantly. She was continually smiling. She was always willing to help. It seems she could anticipate our every need. Cathy greeted everyone when they came in. She asked about our trip and as we were leaving she wished us well. I look forward to returning and seeing her again.

Reviews.Title: “Simple but lots of extras”
Reviews.Author: arkieranger
Reviews.Content: We had the opportunity for a last minute trip to Branson - one of our favorite weekend vacation spots. Our usual hotel was booked so we used Trip Advisor and found the Holiday Inn Express on Green Mountain Drive was highly rated and decided to take a chance with it -- We were not disapointed. Check-in was easy with ample parking in front of the hotel almost near the front door. Our room was on the second floor near the indoor pool which we used twice during our stay. The pool is a salt-water pool instead of the "typical" chorline pool - many businesses and individuals are going with salt-water these days as it is easier to maintain (so I have read). The heated pool and hot tub were in excellent condition with ample towels and patio type furniture with comfy chairs scattered about the pool (it is used for overflow seating for the breakfast bar). The breakfast bar was good - your basic fare of scrambled eggs, sausage and biscuts and gravy as well as cereal and fruit and milk and juices -- all FREE...did I mention FREE? Overall, well worth booking this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “This is a great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Broussard_LALou
Reviews.Content: The service was great, the breakfast good, the beds were the most comfortable I've slept in in any hotel. Everything was clean. I would definitely stay there again. Thank you Holiday Inn Express Branson, MO

Reviews.Title: “We really enjoyed our stay! Hotel was very nice and friendly!”
Reviews.Author: familyoffive44535
Reviews.Content: Location is nice. It was very quiet. The staff is very friendly. Breakfast was good and plenty to choose from. The woman ( I wished I knew her name) serving up breakfast was so helpful and always had a smile! We slept well. Beds were comfortable. The rooms look just like the photos. Our room was pretty clean. I am pretty picky......my children went barefoot and their feet were clean and my white socks were clean...so good job in keeping floors clean. The pool was awesome! I did not smell chlorine at all...I think they have a salt water system, which is nice. Great seating next to the pool that you can even bring dinner and eat around the pool. Nice, new bathroom across from the pool which was great...you didn't have to go all the way back to your room. We enjoyed our stay and definitly would visit again!!

Reviews.Title: “Staff so kind, professional from the housekeeping to management!”
Reviews.Author: Nurse2000
Reviews.Content: We were sooooo.....surprised at our room when we checked in! We thought we wanted to stay at a bigger named hotel, and I am so glad that we choose to stay at this Holiday Inn Express on Green Mountain Dr.! The Lobby was gorgeous, staff so friendly. I had a ill spouse and they did eveything they could beyond my expectations to make sure he was taken care of and helped me to get him and our luggage to the room. The housekeepers were so kind and had a smile everyday. Helped use when I couldn't figure out my key and she went down to desk to fix the problem. It felt nice for them to remember use since we were there for 4 days. All staff asked if my spouse was better and even brought us sprite when I couldn't leave him at the time! I felt like we had stayed there many times, and it was only our first visit! Gift shop had so much information about shows and discount and recomendation, even Tylenol for my husbands fever! I never felt like I had put anyone out! The complimentry breakfast was beyond ok...as I have ate may breakfast's at ok Buffett..There's were above and beyond Ok...Even if we were cutting it short to breakfast ending, we still were brought out hot food and sinful cinnomon rolls. Ever day they changed it up and that was very nice. I can't not mention our room......I wish I could post pics, Our King size Jacuzzi suite out did rooms we had rented that cost twice as much, the room was somuch larger than I expected! The Jacuzzi had more than enough room for 3 if needed. The bed, sheets, linens, pillows and comforter were high quality. Best sleep at a hotel in a long time. When we go back with the children we will be staying there. P,S They have a brand new gorgeous Pool, Hot Tub and exercise room. The location was great and easy to get to where we needed to be! If u have any doubts, I hope this changes ur mind! You will not regret The Holiday Inn Express on Green Mountain Dr. ( there r 2 holiday inn's in Branson) so make sure u reserve the right one! The Smith Family!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: AvonN
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Holiday Inn Express was a highlight of our trip. The hotel was clean and cared for, and the help were very friendly and extremely helpful, Each person who worked there was friendly, whether dealing directly with you or just in passing. The breakfast each morning was exceptional and the two women who worked at the breakfast were wonderful. We stayed there, based on reviews we had read before hand, and could not have been happier. It is a wonderfully friendly and easily accessed place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “It was great from top to bottom”
Reviews.Author: krush63
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in a very convenient location . It also has friendly and helpful staff from top to bottom. Clean. very good breakfast also. Would definitly stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “We loved our stay at this hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: dmavsfan
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our time in Branson & staying at this hotel was great! It is close to everything but off Hwy. 76 which makes it even better. The bed was very comfortable , and it was nice having two sinks for the bathroom area. Everyone we dealt with on the staff were all so friendly & helpful. The breakfast was very good (especially the cinnamon rolls). Would definitely recommend this hotel!!!

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay here!”
Reviews.Author: brew_crew122
Reviews.Content: Noticed around 9:00 the first evening after returning from shopping that our air conditioner was filled with rodent feces. Tried to move us to another room, but it had the same problem. Hotel looks new and remodeled, but has a dirty feel to it. Ended up spending a little bit more and stayed at the Marriot around the corner. Much better hotel, and WAY cleaner! Holiday Inn did nothing to help us out, only telling us all of their "sister" hotels were booked up. The general manager tried telling us the feces was something else that was put in there to keep moisture from building up, however 2 of his employees had never seen it, and vacuumed it out after seeing it. They also gave the room we declined to another customer who was checking in later than us, knowing the air had been running all day with the feces in the room! I'm now a proud Marriot member, and will never stay at Holiday Inn again (had a previous bad stay in St. Louis as well) I've been a priority club member for 20 years! Terrible service, and disgusting rooms.

Reviews.Title: “The Best Stay Ever!!!!”
Reviews.Author: littleladyredhat
Reviews.Content: After much searching and reading reviews, my sister and I decided on the Holiday Inn Express o nGreen Mountain Drive to stay in during our weeks vacation in Branson. From being greeted by Felix and Danny and being made to feel so welcome, we knew without seeing the room that everything was perfect. Breakfast was so exceptional as Cathy does a wonderful job keeping everything spotless and the food was so good!!!!! Wanted to take her home with us! Julio in housekeeping made us smile and laugh each morning. Jason in Maintence is there ffor any little problem you may have. Even to having a jar of Salsa we coudn't open that Tiesa at the front desk smiled and opened for us. Then but not least, is Jerry the Manager with his ready smile and all his warm manner which makes you feel so at home. This is a 5 star hotel with over 5 star staff that we will stay in everytime we are in Branson and walk away from each time feeling that we are leaving part of ourselves behind,

Reviews.Title: “Such a nice place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: lyingfromyou
Reviews.Content: My fiance and I took our first vacation together to Branson. We found this hotel online and it was fairly competitive with the rate and the location was just minutes from area attractions. We stayed in the King Jacuzzi sweet which was absolutely gorgeous! It was on the 5th floor, but having two elevators kept the waiting time down. The people behind the desk were very friendly and knowledgeable. They even sell tickets to local shows--many with discounts--right there in the hotel lobby gift shop. I loved staying at this hotel. The indoor pool and hot tub were clean and towels were provided there as a convenience.The only bad thing was that the breakfast was not the greatest--the coffee was the best part! :-) Overall--I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, Good Value, Good Bed”
Reviews.Author: voyager413
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival, the front desk clerk had a difficult time locating our reservation. Even with our confirmation number, the room assigned to us was not what we had requested. The clerk made it right, and apologized for the mistake repeatedly. The room was clean and had no odors. The bed was not rock hard, nor was it a pillow top either. The room was equipped with a writing desk and chair, mini-microwave, mini-refrig, and coffee maker. The shower water pressure was lacking ( 3rd floor) so it took awhile to rinse off. The bathroom door creaked so bad, you would have thought it was a haunted house at halloween. The A/C unit would cycle on and off during the night with a loud bang. The hot breakfast each morning was plentiful with the standard sweet rolls, eggs, biscuits and gravy, cereal, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: cloandjoe
Reviews.Content: This was a really nice and comfortable stay. Almost smelled and looked new. People friendly. Mike at front desk called about 10 min. after getting to our room to make sure everything was to our satisfaction. That is a first for us! Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: “Quality Service”
Reviews.Author: DoodleDiva
Reviews.Content: Stayed at HI Express over the Labor Day holiday traveling with a grandparent and 5 year old. Danny at the front desk is wonderful. He made us feel welcome right away with his wonderful service. We had a slight issue upon arrival in which he personally took care of. Breakfast was yummy and had so much more than your standard 'continental' that other hotels offer. The cinammon rolls are addictive! Quality, comfortable beds, linens, and pillows on top of a quiet room was much appreciated. The indoor pool and spa was lovely with updated lounge furniture and music piped in. Love the location in which you can quickly zip to anything without being stuck in traffic. Will stay again...thanks again Mr. Danny!

Reviews.Title: “Want clean, friendly and convenient”
Reviews.Author: LittleEb
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our whole trip to Branson, Mo. but when you can come back to a clean,maintained room each day after seeing shows and sightseeing then get ready to go out for an evening of more fun and shows it just makes life so easy. The staff was helpful with information and directions and the reservation feature to help with show schedules and booking from your hotel was wonderful.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay in a great location”
Reviews.Author: jaguar34
Reviews.Content: My wife and I returned to Branson for the first time in about 10 years and were very, very satisfied with this Holiday Inn and everything that it offered. We had a king room with an in room jacuzzi that was fantastic. The service was outstanding from the front desk personnel to the breakfast staff to the maintenance staff. We had absolutely no complaints and will stay there every time that we return to Branson. We especially liked the location as it is not on the main highway and once you learn a shortcut or two it's so easy to get around town.

Reviews.Title: “Utopia”
Reviews.Author: pug57_10
Reviews.Content: You could go over our room with white gloves and still have white. All areas were spotless. Plenty of towels, excellent accomodations, friendly all the way from the desk to the maid service, breakfast attendant. Honestly, we were treated like royalty. We enjoyed the Hot Tub, fitness center, full breakfast and special treatment. On top of all this, it was priced so reasonable. We have stayed there on our last two visits & will never stay elsewhere. Staying somewhere else would be unthinkable. Thank you everyone. Bill & Peggy Roe

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOLIDAY INN in BRANSON”
Reviews.Author: Gotmywings36
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Holiday Inn Express on Green Mountain drive and it was such a fantastic stay, I wanted everyone to know about it. Danny at the Front Desk was wonderful, he got us to our room quickly and then called us a few minutes later to ask if everything was alright in our room.
